name: 2016 Acura ILX™
snippet: The 2016 Acura ILX has a sportier focus than other entry-luxury sedans, without sacrificing comfort and refinement.

name: 2015 Alfa Romeo 4C™
snippet: The 2015 Alfa Romeo 4C is a dazzling sports-car reincarnation of a heady past, and a future classic in its own right.

name: 2014 Aston Martin DB9™ 4G
snippet: The 2015 Aston Martin DB9 is coming soon. You can sign up to receive email updates any time we learn anything new on the Aston Martin DB9.

name: 2016 Audi A3™
snippet: The 2016 Audi A3 models offer a variety of body styles, powertrains, and options to battle whatever the small luxury segment has to offer.

name: 2016 Bentley Mulsanne™
snippet: The 2016 Bentley Mulsanne is a heroically impressive hyper-luxury limousine--particularly in Speed trim..
